title: Google assistant doesn't speak for some things on my Pixel 4a
content: Hello for some reason on the Google Pixel 4A whenever I ask it what the weather is like outside it never Replies it just shows the weather on the screen but then if I ask it other questions like how are you etc. then it does reply vocally. I'm not really sure what's going on. ðŸ™‚
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a
